chapter.title: Technical Support
chapter.para: Technical support for Anyframe is provided through the menu on the website of Anyframe Open Source Community (http://www.anyframejava.org/), forum and it provides from simple QnA to detailed guide and solutions for source codes. If technical consulting is required for specific projects, requests can be made through the contacts on the website of Anyframe Open Source Community. Also, through JIRA(http://dev.anyframejava.org/jira/), an issue management system, issues related to bug fix, improvements, new features can be registered. For further details, please refer to here.
